subject: Steroids
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Frankie Andreu, once Lance Armstrong’s teammate, said he hoped admitting his use of EPO would help change the tradition of doping in cycling.
snippet: Frankie Andreu, once Lance Armstrong’s teammate, said he hoped admitting his use of EPO would help change the tradition of doping in cycling.
